title: 'Another day in NYC': Watch utter chaos unfold at McDonalds, and that's before someone pulls out an ax
description: You're in New Yorkkkkkkkkkk! Concrete jungle where things are made of, and there's nothing you can't do...except enjoy a Big Mac in peace without things popping off on sight. title: Legal Influencer exposes liberal dark money group paying TikTokers to promote anti-Trump Jan 6 disinformation
description:
A legal influencer is exposing an Obama-affiliated dark money group paying TikTokers $400 to spread their propaganda and disinformation about January 6th.
